# Neutron capture gammas for C-12 generated by hand from data
# obtained from http://www.nndc.bnl.gov/capgam/byn/page007.html
#
# First column lists probability for decay scheme; second column lists number of gammas
# in decay scheme; gamma energies (in keV) are then listed separated by a space.
#
.6747 1 4945.30
.3212 2 3683.92 1261.76
.004 2 3089.05 1856.72
